con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="http://services.trustvesta.com/MobilityUS_Service/Service">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ser:PaymentDeviceChargeRegisterWithTokenRequest>\r <!--You may enter the following 16 items in any order-->\r <ser:SessionKey>?</ser:SessionKey>\r <ser:ChargeAccountNumberToken>?</ser:ChargeAccountNumberToken>\r <ser:ChargeExpirationMMYY>?</ser:ChargeExpirationMMYY>\r <ser:ChargeCVN>?</ser:ChargeCVN>\r <ser:PDFirstName>?</ser:PDFirstName>\r <ser:PDLastName>?</ser:PDLastName>\r <ser:PDAddressLine1>?</ser:PDAddressLine1>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:PDAddressLine2>?</ser:PDAddressLine2>\r <ser:PDCity>?</ser:PDCity>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:PDRegion>?</ser:PDRegion>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:PDPostalCode>?</ser:PDPostalCode>\r <ser:PDCountryCode>?</ser:PDCountryCode>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:PDEmailAddress>?</ser:PDEmailAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:OriginatingIPAddress>?</ser:OriginatingIPAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:DefaultPaymentDevice>?</ser:DefaultPaymentDevice>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:WebSessionID>?</ser:WebSessionID>\r </ser:PaymentDeviceChargeRegisterWithTokenRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
